name: Pink Onion
author: David J.
description:
Really enjoyed it here, very quaint, not in your face fancy, relaxed, intimate place with truly knock-out good food. We shared the parpadelle bolognese which was absolutely delicious, and a pizza which was very well done indeed. The large is monstrous FYI.

8 beers on tap and something for everyone as they pretty much ran the whole gamit of styles. 

Service was superb, very friendly, caring, not in any way invasive or stuffy.

Come here!
